pageContext.claim: “The only way she [Hillary Clinton] filled up the arena was to get Jay-Z. And his language was so filthy that it made me, like, the most clean-cut human being on earth.”
pageContext.analysis: Clinton often filled up venues during the campaign with or without Jay-Z. It's surprising and ironic to see Trump schoolmarmishly disapproving of someone else's "filthy" language. Before he ran for president, he made a slew of crude remarks as a frequent guest on Howard Stern's radio show and spoke in vulgar terms about grabbing women by the genitals on the "Access Hollywood" tape. During the campaign, he dropped an F-bomb at a rally in New Hampshire. As president, he referred to El Salvador, Haiti and African nations as "shithole countries."
